actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that amounts received by any employer under the Emergency Veterans' Job Training Program Act of 1983 in connection with the employment of any veteran shall be excluded from gross income of the employer.

summary.text: Provides that amounts received by an employer under the Emergency Veterans' Job Training Program Act of 1983 in connection with the employment of any veteran shall be excluded from the gross income of the employer.

titles.title: A bill to provide that amounts received by any employer under the Emergency Veterans' Job Training Program Act of 1983 in connection with the employment of any veteran shall be excluded from gross income of the employer.
